alert.note: Alert for Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 2:27PM MDT until March 31 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM MDT FRIDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet MSL with a mix of rain and snow below 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches in the mountains above 5500 feet and up to 4 inches in the valleys below. * WHERE...Albion, Almo, Malta, Rockland, Holbrook, Inkom, McCammon, Downey, and Lava Hot Springs. * WHEN...From noon Wednesday to 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
